Complete AI Meal Planning Features

Discover how Cuvio's intelligent features transform your meal planning experience with AI-powered personalization, nutrition tracking, and smart automation.

AI-Powered Intelligence

Our advanced AI technology learns your preferences and adapts to your lifestyle for the perfect meal planning experience.

AI Assistant & Sous-Chef

Get contextual cooking advice directly within recipes. Our AI Assistant understands your cooking level, dietary preferences, and available ingredients to provide personalized guidance.

  • ✓ Real-time cooking tips and techniques
  • ✓ Smart ingredient substitutions that maintain flavor
  • ✓ Contextual advice based on your skill level
  • ✓ Dietary restriction-aware suggestions

How It Works

1
Ask Questions

Ask about cooking techniques, ingredient alternatives, or recipe modifications while following any recipe.

2
Get Smart Answers

Receive personalized advice that considers your dietary needs, cooking skills, and available ingredients.

3
Cook with Confidence

Follow step-by-step guidance tailored to your preferences and skill level.

  • ✓ Cuisine preferences and spice levels

Set and track your nutritional targets with detailed macro and micronutrient information.

Location & Seasonal

Optimize for seasonal produce and local availability for better health and cost savings.

Choose Your Cooking Persona

Six unique personas that prioritize different aspects of meal planning to match your lifestyle and goals.

Wellness Witch

Focuses on nourishing meals rooted in balance and intention with whole, unprocessed foods.

  • • Prioritizes anti-inflammatory ingredients
  • • Emphasizes gut-friendly options
  • • Includes superfoods and healing spices

Desk Warrior

Smart meals for people with zero time to spare, maximizing efficiency and minimizing prep time.

  • • 30 minutes or less cooking time
  • • One-pot and sheet pan recipes
  • • Batch cooking and meal prep strategies

Budget Alchemist

Turns simple ingredients into culinary gold, maximizing value and minimizing waste.

  • • Affordable, versatile staples
  • • Multiple meals from base ingredients
  • • Seasonal and cost-effective produce

Family Hero

Creates meals that make everyone happy, including picky eaters with broad appeal.

  • • Crowd-pleasing family meals
  • • Hidden nutrition strategies
  • • Customizable elements for preferences

Culinary Adventurer

A passport to new flavors every week with diverse global cuisines and bold combinations.

  • • Global cuisines and techniques
  • • Bold, exciting flavor combinations
  • • Authentic ingredients and methods

Analysis Gourmand

Perfectly balanced meals backed by data with precise nutritional targets and macro ratios.

  • • Precise nutritional calculations
  • • Scientific nutrition principles
  • • Exact measurements and portions

Three Meal Planning Modes

Whether you need a full week of meals or just want to use what's in your fridge, Cuvio adapts to your needs.

Plan Mode

Generate complete meal plans for several days with multiple meal types. Perfect for weekly meal prep and family planning.

✓ Multi-day meal planning (3-7 days)
✓ Breakfast, lunch, dinner, and snacks
✓ Protein and carb selection flexibility
✓ Complete nutrition balance

Meal Mode

Generate a single meal with your chosen proteins and carbs. Perfect for when you know what you want to cook but need inspiration.

✓ Single meal generation
✓ Quick recipe inspiration
✓ Instant shopping list generation
✓ Perfect for spontaneous cooking

Leftovers Mode

Take a photo of your fridge contents and let Cuvio create a delicious meal using what you already have. Zero waste, maximum creativity.

✓ Fridge photo recognition
✓ Zero waste cooking
✓ Creative ingredient use
✓ Reduce food waste and save money

Smart Automation Features

Let Cuvio handle the tedious parts of meal planning so you can focus on cooking and enjoying your meals.

Smart Shopping Lists

Automatically generated shopping lists scaled to your household size. Check off items as you shop and share with family members.

Cooking Tracking

Mark meals as cooked to track your progress and build your cooking confidence over time.

Favorites & History

Like meals you love and access your 10 most recent meal plans. Build your personal recipe collection.

Recipe Swapping

Swap any recipe for a new one or choose from favorites. Shopping lists update automatically.

Smart Notifications

Get daily and weekly meal planning reminders at your preferred times. Never forget to plan your meals.

Nutrition Analytics

Track your nutritional progress with detailed macro and micronutrient analytics and insights.

Seasonal Optimization

Automatically prioritize seasonal and locally available ingredients for better taste and value.

Cooking Tips

Get helpful cooking tips, techniques, and ingredient information to improve your skills.
